alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 7:25AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON...OSWEGO...AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 725 AM EST, a band of heavy snow extended from Belleville and Adams Center eastward across parts of the Tug Hill Plateau to Copenhagen and Castorland. The band, which had slowly settled to the south overnight, south be nearly stationary for the first part of this morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Stony Point, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Adams, Herrings, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Southwick Beach State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Sackets Harbor, Martinsburg, Henderson, Black River and Smithville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 39 and 45. SAFETY INFO... The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for the road crews to keep the roads clear. &&
